items.sentence: I bought him a drink to thank him for his help.
Tom said Mary shouldn\'t have done that inside.
Tom and Mary have been dating for three months.
Tom and Mary started chatting like old friends.
Tom became anorexic when he was in high school.
Since I was all by myself, I felt a bit lonely.
I just hope they catch the guy who stabbed Tom.
I just thought of something really interesting.
Tom says that he has to go to Boston next week.
Tom started chasing Mary around the playground.
